scripts.test-cucumber: NODE_ENV=test npm run fixtures && NODE_ENV=test cucumber-js cucumber/features/ -r cucumber/features/support -r cucumber/features/
scripts.test-mocha: NODE_ENV=test npm run fixtures && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter nyan
scripts.test: npm run test-cucumber && npm run test-mocha
scripts.test-ci: npm run jshint-ci && npm run coverage-ci
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test npm run fixtures && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber.js -- cucumber/features/ -f pretty --tags ~@ignore && NODE_ENV=test npm run test-mocha
scripts.coverage-ci-cucumber: NODE_ENV=test npm run fixtures && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber.js -- cucumber/features/ --tags ~@ignore --format json > $CIRCLE_TEST_REPORTS/tests.cucumber
scripts.coverage-ci-mocha: NODE_ENV=test npm run fixtures && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --dir ./coverage-mocha -- -R spec > $CIRCLE_TEST_REPORTS/tests.mocha
scripts.coverage-ci: npm run coverage-ci-cucumber && npm run coverage-ci-mocha
